link_desc:
Description

Template to check if there are Windows Updates are available.

The updates are divided in 5 different categories:

  • Critical
  • Feature packs
  • Rollups
  • Security packs
  • Updates (Optional)

Zip file containing

  • proces-zbx_winupdate.png
  • settings.ini (Required)
  • zbx-winupdate.au3 (source code)
  • zbx-winupdate.exe (Compiled version Required)
  • zbx-winupdates-1.01.xml (template)

Tested with

  • Zabbix 3.0
  • Windows 2008 R2
  • Windows 2012 R2

Installation

== On the server ==

  1. Upload the template.
  2. Edit the key "last check" to the path where "zbx-winupdate" is located.
  3. Create/Edit triggers for your needs.

== On the client ==

  1. Copy "zbx-winupdate.exe"and "settings.ini" to directory "C:\Zabbix\plugins\zbx-winupdateC:\Zabbix\plugins\zbx-winupdate"
  2. Edit settings.ini:
    - SENDER to the path of your zabbix_sender.exe
    - CONFIG to the path of your zabbix_agentd.win.conf
  3. Make sure that "EnableRemoteCommand=1" is enabled in your "zabbix_agent.win.conf"

Release notes 1.01

  • Updated Template:
    - Changed itemkey for "Zabbix Agent" to "Zabbix Trapper" (critical/feature packs/rollups/security/service packs/total/uncategorized/updates)
    - Added item: Check "startup" state of service "Windows Update"
  • Updated zbx-winupdate.exe:
    - Added function to hide hidden updates (true/false)
  • Updated settings.ini:
    - Added Parameter to hide hidden updates (true/false)

Please Rate this plugin :)
author: bitfinity.nl
